workflowInfo.workflowDescription: IBM-MF-AUTO-DELETE-NOLD-USS-FILES - Delete N old USS files

variable.name: input-path
variable.label: Please enter the input path
variable.abstract: Input path for the "find and delete" script (Don't use wildcards!)
variable.description: This will be used as input path for the find and delete script. (Don't use wildcards in the path)

variable.name: how-old
variable.label: Please enter the number of days old to be used in script
variable.abstract: This will be used as the days old value in the script.
variable.description: This will be used as the period of time in the script. Files found within this range will be deleted!

variable.name: archive-path
variable.label: Please enter the archive path
variable.abstract: This will be used as the archive path for the find script.
variable.description: If you would like to archive the files before deleting them. Fill this varible with the archive path

variable.name: file-name
variable.label: Please enter the file name or extension
variable.abstract: This will be used as the name argument for the find script.
variable.description: If you would like to look for a specific file or extension. Fill this varible with the argument (use wildcards to provide a valid format e.g '*.txt')

step.name: DELETE-OLD-FILES
step.title: Find and delete old files
step.description: This bash script will be executed on USS to delete 'n' day old files from an input path
step.instructions: - Be careful and validate the input information before submiting the job (This is a disrruptive command!) - Make sure you have the proper authorization to perform the commands - Make sure the input path is correct (it is not recommended to use wildcards)

template.inlineTemplate: #!/bin/bash echo 'Running script to clean up old uss files!' echo 'The input path is: '$input-path echo 'This is the name argument: '$file-name echo 'This is the archive path: '$archive-path echo 'Days old value is: '$how-old if [[ $input-path == *"*"* ]]; then echo "The input path contains wildcards!" exit -1 fi if [ -d $archive-path ]; then echo 'These commands will be executed: find $input-path -type f -name "*" -mtime +$how-old -exec mv {} $archive-path \; ' echo 'find $input-path -type f -name "*" -mtime +$how-old -exec rm {} \;' find $input-path -type f -name "*" -mtime +$how-old -exec mv {} $archive-path \; find $input-path -type f -name "*" -mtime +$how-old -exec rm {} \; else echo 'This command will be executed: find $input-path -type f -name "*" -mtime +$how-old -exec rm {} \; ' find $input-path -type f -name "*" -mtime +$how-old -exec rm {} \; fi
